title: From Takemi Fellow to Health Minister: Q & A with Keizo Takemi, Japan’s Former Minister of Health, Labour and Welfare | Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health

quotes: Takemi alumni 2007 – 2008. Former Minister Keizo Takemi is seated second in the front row, from left to right.

Our commitment to universal health coverage (UHC), which began in 1961 under strong political will, and our experience in building resilient health systems serve as valuable models for other nations, with the concept of Human Security central to our approach.

organizations.name: WHO
quotes: Our leadership in facilitating international organizations’ coordination, such as WHO and World Bank involvement in multilateral health efforts, will be crucial in promoting health equity and sustainability.
